extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the official mobile app for The Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival! This app is a joint development of EDGE Media Network and The Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival; it's designed to be a comprehensive guide to our annual festival, including events, photos and interactive features.Features for AndroidNews :: Stay in the know regarding all the latest news from The Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival right on your mobile device! Including announcements, hot event notifications and hotel specials.Events :: The Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival events calendar is a comprehensive list of what's going on - and you can add each item right to your phone's calendar, so that you never miss a beat.Photos :: View official photos from EDGE and The Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival's official photographers.Screenings :: We've got the comprehensive list of screenings at the festival right here on our app - so you can find every film, learn where you can see it, and get directions on how to get there.Sponsors :: We love our sponsors - so should you! Get information on the organizations that make The Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival possible.Hotels :: Looking for a place to stay in town? Check out our partner hotels, including special deals just for The Miami Gay & Lesbian Film Festival.
